org.vanilladb.core.server

Class VanillaDb

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vanilladb.core.server.VanillaDb

  • public class VanillaDb
extends Object
    The class that provides system-wide static global values. These values must be initialized by the method init before use. The methods initFileMgr, initFileAndLogMgr, initTaskMgr, initTxMgr, initCatalogMgr, initStatMgr, and initCheckpointingTask provide limited initialization, and are useful for debugging purposes.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init(String dirName)
        Initializes the system. This method is called during system startup.
        Parameters:
        dirName - the name of the database directory

      • init

        public static void init(String dirName,
                        StoredProcedureFactory factory)
        Initializes the system. This method is called during system startup.
        Parameters:
        dirName - the name of the database directory
        factory - the stored procedure factory for generating stored procedures

      • isInited

        public static boolean isInited()
        Is VanillaDB initialized ?
        Returns:
        true if it is initialized, otherwise false.

      • initFileMgr

        public static void initFileMgr(String dirName)
        Initializes only the file manager.
        Parameters:
        dirName - the name of the database directory

      • initFileAndLogMgr

        public static void initFileAndLogMgr(String dirName)
        Initializes the file and log managers.
        Parameters:
        dirName - the name of the database directory

      • initTaskMgr

        public static void initTaskMgr()
        Initializes the task manager.

      • initTxMgr

        public static void initTxMgr()
        Initializes the transaction manager.

      • initCatalogMgr

        public static void initCatalogMgr(boolean isNew,
                                  Transaction tx)
        Initializes the catalog manager. Note that the catalog manager should be initialized before system recovery.
        Parameters:
        isNew - an indication of whether a new database needs to be created.
        tx - the transaction performing the initialization

      • initStatMgr

        public static void initStatMgr(Transaction tx)
        Initializes the statistics manager. Note that this manager should be initialized after system recovery.
        Parameters:
        tx - the transaction performing the initialization

      • initCheckpointingTask

        public static void initCheckpointingTask()
        Initialize a background checkpointing task.

        public static Planner newPlanner()
        Creates a planner for SQL commands. To change how the planner works, modify this method.
        Returns:
        the system's planner for SQL commands
